articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Election as NDC Chairman Celebrated
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and press organs, labor innovators and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army  Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman of the DPRK was a historic event of weighty significance in the work for the prosperity of the socialist country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					This great auspicious event noteworthy in the history of the nation provided the servicepersons and people with a sure guarantee for successfully carrying forward and developing President
						 Kim Il Sung's idea and exploits for the self-reliant national defence building and his unique cause of nation building and more dynamically accelerating the all-people movement for building a rich and powerful country, he noted, and went on to say:
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave a power guarantee for further cementing the Korean-style state and social system on the principle of attaching priority to the military affairs and pursuing the Songun politics in all aspects by seeing to it that the position and authority of the NDC were enhanced and a new state machinery with the NDC as its mainstay established.
					
					 Today we should vigorously effect a new great revolutionary surge by giving full play to the inexhaustible mental power under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il and thus make a historic leaping forward in building a great prosperous and powerful nation and accelerate the national reunification and the ultimate victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Sustained, big efforts should be directed to increasing the national defence capabilities under the banner of Songun so as to provide a reliable military guarantee for the building of a thriving socialist nation.
					
					The Korean People's Army, the main force of our revolution and the hardcore forces for defending the country, should establish the revolutionary commanding system and the military discipline in which the whole army acts as one in the idea and intention of the Supreme Commander and on his order and instruction under the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the leadership of revolution headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!"
					
					 We should continue to push ahead with the work for increasing the national defence capability as a nationwide and all-people undertaking, give priority to the development of the defence industry in keeping with the requirement of the line of economic construction in the era of Songun and provide on the most preferential basis everything needed to steadily raise the level of making the defence industry Juche-oriented and modern, thus cementing the material and technical foundations of the self-defensive military capability.
					
					 The traits of attaching importance to the military affairs should be established in the whole society and the army-people unity in idea and working spirit successfully realized so as to fully display the proud picture of the great unity between the army and the people in Songun Korea. And the Workers' Party of Korea's line of placing all the people under arms and fortifying the whole country should be implemented to the letter to make perfect preparations for coping with the event of contingency.
					
					All the sectors and units should establish the strict discipline whereby to unconditionally accept any order and instruction of the NDC and implement them without fail in time and thus reliably ensure
						Kim Jong Il's monolithic leadership over the national defence-related affairs and give full play to the might of the Korean-style state machinery with the main stress put on the national defence.
					
					 We should resolutely smash the outsiders' interference and the separatists' confrontation moves and bring about a radical turn in the movement for national reunification, true to the three charters for national reunification that comprehend the noble patriotic idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Victory and glory are always in store for the army and the people of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation along the road of Juche, the road of Songun, rallied as one in mind around the headquarters of the revolution led by Kim Jong Il, the reporter concluded.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass rally was held at Kim Il Sung Square on Wednesday to hail the successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					Attending the rally were senior party, army and state officials and at least 100,000 citizens from all walks of life in the capital.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report at the rally. 
					
					 The reporter said that the successful satellite launch marked a great auspicious event of the nation as it demonstrated the dignity and invincible might of Songun Korea and a historic event which heralded the victory in the cause of building a great prosperous powerful nation.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The satellite launch clearly showed the might of the Juche-based industry the Korean people have built by the sweat of their brows for several decades under the leadership of the great leaders and the great party and the scientific and technological level of the country. It also proved that their cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph.
					
					 The satellite launch meant a gun salute heralding the advent of the era of a thriving nation at a time when all the people are out in the general advance to open the gate to a great prosperous powerful socialist nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. Herein lies the great significance of the launch.
					
					 The DPRK succeeded in launching the satellite despite the enemies' unprecedented political and military pressure and desperate obstructions. 
					
					This was a shining fruition of the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who exerted utmost efforts for bolstering the country's political and military potentials and developing science and technology, foreseeing a rosy future of the country.
					
					 The reporter said that the successful launch of the satellite would be always recorded in the history of the country as a great auspicious event of Kim Il Sung's nation as it laid a historic milestone in the development of the nation's science and technology.  
					
					 He called for translating the Party's plan for building a thriving nation into reality earlier than scheduled, winning one victory after another on all fronts of socialist construction by effecting fresh great revolutionary upswing.
					
					 Noting that the situation still remains tense in the country due to the hostile policy of the hard-line conservative forces of the U.S. towards the DPRK and the moves of the south Korean warmongers, he underscored the need to thoroughly establish the traits of attaching importance to military affairs throughout the society, give priority to the development of the defence industry and increase the country's defence capability in every way true to the Party's Songun leadership. 
					
					 The report was followed by the speeches made by representatives of scientists, workers, agricultural workers, youth and students. 
					
					 The speakers warmly congratulated the scientists, technicians and workers for having accurately put the homemade satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 into orbit thereby heralding the advent of the era of a thriving nation. 
					
					 They stressed that the successful satellite launch signified a great historic event that dealt a telling blow at the arrogant U.S.-led imperialist powers keen to realize their hegemonic ambition, talking a lot about "their scientific and technological superiority" and proved the tremendous might of the servicepersons' and people's national self-esteem and independence. 
					
					 They vowed to bring about a signal innovation and a great leap forward in the building of a thriving nation true to the Party's leadership.

articles.title: KPA General Staff Blasts Japan's Ruckus after DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
KPA General Staff Blasts Japan's Ruckus after DPRK's Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The General Staff of the Korean People's Army released a report Wednesday.
					 The report said:
					
					 At a time when not only all the Korean people but the world rejoice over and hail the DPRK's successful launch of satellite for peaceful purposes only the Japanese reactionaries are kicking up a ruckus, conducting an operation to search for parts of the carrier rocket body that dropped in sea waters after being separated from it right after its launch.
					
					 The dependable scientists and technicians of the DPRK succeeded in accurately putting satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 into its orbit by carrier rocket Unha-2 according to the state plan for the development of outer space. This was a shining victory in the political, diplomatic and national defence fields of the great Workers' Party of Korea and a great event of significance in the nation's history which proved before the world that the sovereign dignity of Songun Korea is truth and that truth is sure to triumph.
					
					 Voices that the DPRK's satellite launch is an inviolable legitimate right of a sovereign state are heard not only from various countries but from the UN forum.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries worked desperately, blustering that they would "intercept" the DPRK's above-said satellite long before its launch. They are mobilizing warships for the operation to find out those parts in defiance of reality. This is a vicious act of espionage and interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK and an intolerable military provocative act of infringing upon its sovereignty.
					
					 They provoked the laughter of the world people and suffered shame by releasing a false report that the DPRK "launched satellite" although it did not do it, obsessed by persecution mania. Their operation to search for the above-mentioned parts only reveals their deplorable position in which they feel utterly frustrated by the satellite launch and proves that it is nothing but a ridiculous and foolish ploy to improve their tarnished image even a bit.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should drop their inveterate bad habit of always doing evils to others and stop the above-said absurd military espionage at once.
					
					 As already clarified, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will neither overlook the reckless provocations made by the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, against the DPRK nor allow them to infringe upon its sovereignty even a bit.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to an official concerned by Miguel Angel Gala Valiente, Cuban military attache who is doyen of the corps, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here today visited the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The visitors looked round photos showing undying feats of Kim Jong Il who has led the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK to build a great prosperous and powerful nation to the victory under the banner of Songun.
					
					 They went round works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books introducing politics, economy, culture, history and others of the DPRK.
					
					 After the visit, they made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Tuesday on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 16th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Among those present there on invitation were Vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Ui Chun, Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Minister of Education Kim Yong Jin, Vice Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Pak Kyong Son and Vice-Minister of the People's Armed Forces Pak Jae Gyong. 
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy here were present there.
					
					 Jose Manuel Galego Montano said in his speech at the reception that the Cuban people join the Korean people in significantly commemorating the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung and the 16th anniversary of the election of Kim Jong Il as chairman of the DPRK NDC. 
					
					 Expressing the hope that the fraternal relations between Cuba and the DPRK would grow stronger, he wished Kim Jong Il great success in his work of leading the Korean people. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech noted that it is the expression of trust of the Cuban party, government and people in Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il that the Cuban people join the Korean people in commemorating their above-said significant anniversaries and this constitutes great encouragement to the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He hoped that the Cuban government and people would achieve great successes in their work to protect the gains of socialism from the U.S. vicious moves to isolate and stifle Cuba and steadily develop them under the leadership of respected Fidel Castro Ruz and Raul Castro Ruz.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Deputies who will attend the 1st Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Wednesday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					They made deep bows to the President, founder of the DPRK and father of socialist Korea, cherishing deeper in their mind the great pride and self-esteem with which the Korean people have won victories one after another while creating a brilliant history of building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Pay Homage to Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Pay Homage to Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Deputies to attend the First Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly laid a wreath before the bust of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Wednesday.
					 Written on the ribbon of the wreath were letters "The revolutionary exploits of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, are immortal!"
					
					 The deputies observed a moment's silence in memory of the noble life of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu who devotedly safeguarded President Kim Il Sung and performed undying feats on behalf of the country and the people.
					
					 They also laid bunches of flowers before the cemetery and paid silent tribute to the revolutionary martyrs.

articles.title: DPRK Stirred by Launching of Satellite
articles.content:
DPRK Stirred by Launching of Satellite
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians of the DPRK succeeded in putting Kwangmyongsong-2, an experimental communications satellite, into the orbit by  carrier rocket Unha-2 under the state long-term plan for the development of outer space on April 5.
					 Upon hearing this news, the Koreans are excited with great joy.
					
					 Chief Secretary Kim Phyong Hae of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea said that this historic event is a manifestation of the unshakable will of leader Kim Jong Il to open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation without fail, breaking through any difficulty. He continued:
					
					 The successful launching of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 is not a mere fruition of wisdom and talent but a fierce confrontation with those who disliked it. It demonstrated the mettle of Songun Korea.
					
					 Kim Thae Bong, minister of Metal Industry, had this to say: Our scientists and technicians developed the carrier rocket and satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and creditably put it into the orbit entirely with our own efforts and technology. Through this stark reality, I have keenly realized the might of self-supporting economy once again.
					
					 The duty of the metal industry, a pillar of independent socialist economy, is heavy in the efforts for effecting a great upsurge, he said, and stressed: It will drastically increase the production of Juche iron and supply raw materials to metal factories in concentrated way so as to make the already-built modern production processes pay off profusely. 
					
					 Pyon Yong Rip, president of State Academy of Sciences, remarked: Our scientists and technicians manufactured and launched successfully the carrier rocket and the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 with our design and technology, thus demonstrating fully to the world the dignity and honor as a satellite producing and launching country.
					
					 It has thus laid down a firm scientific and technological foundation for the promotion of scientific researches into the peaceful use of outer space and the launching of practical satellites in the future.
					
					 Kim Chang Ryong, a general of the Korean People's Army, stated that the peaceful use of the outer space is an inalienable legitimate right of a sovereign state and our launching of the peaceful satellite is a righteous work for the prosperity of the country and nation and for the progress of the humankind.
					
					 The successful launching of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 is a manifestation not only of the might of the Juche-oriented science and technology and the independent national economy but also of our invincible military power. Depending on a strong gun are the development of science and technology and the building of an economic power as well as peace, he emphasized.

articles.title: Pyongyang in Festival Mood
articles.content:
Pyongyang in Festival Mood
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the venue of the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival, is seething in a festival mood now.
					 The exterior and the interior of the Pyongyang Grand Theatre are garbed in festive attire for the opening ceremony of the festival.
					
					 The East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the Moranbong Theatre, the State Theatre and other theatres designated for festival performances as well as streets are decked out with slogans, large picture boards and decorations welcoming the participants of the festival. 
					
					 Festival posters have been pasted up everywhere to add to the festival mood.  
					
					 Pyongyang Koryo Hotel, Yanggakdo International Hotel and other service centers are waiting for foreign guests, having finished preparations to entertain them on the highest level.
					
					 The theatres have completely arranged all the facilities for successful performances, from acoustic and lighting devices, practice rooms, make-up rooms down to public service amenities.
					
					 The festival organizing committee is girding all its energies for the success of the festival which will help toward tightening bonds among the world people and artistes who treasure independence, peace and friendship and promoting cultural exchange and cooperation among them.

articles.title: School Youth and Children Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
School Youth and Children Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- School youth and children in Pyongyang are visiting Mangyongdae, a sacred place of revolution, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 This place was visited on Tuesday by thousands of pupils and students of primary and secondary schools including Kim Song Ju Primary School, Pyongyang Primary School No. 4, Pyongyang Ryongwang Secondary School and Pyongyang Changjon Secondary School.
					
					They formed ranks in front of the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and started their march to Mangyongdae, carrying the flags bearing the portraits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretay
						 Kim Jong Il in the van of the ranks.
					
					 After arriving in Mangyongdae, they laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandfather and grandmother of the President, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his father and mother, and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 In the yard of Kim Il Sung's old home in Mangyongdae, the visitors looked round the relics carefully preserved there, being briefed on the fact that he was born and spent his childhood at this historic home while fostering the high ambition to liberate the country and embarked on the road of revolution in his early years.
					
					 They visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum and went round revolutionary sites and relics in Mangyongdae.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the China Federation of Literature and Art Circles headed by Vice-President Bai Shuxiang arrived in Pyongyang by air on Wednesday to participate in the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.

articles.title: Rosy Is Future of DPRK under Leadership of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rosy Is Future of DPRK under Leadership of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The future of the DPRK is immensely bright as it holds Kim Jong Il, the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu and statesman of general-type, at the top posts of the Party, the army and the state.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in an editorial on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission in the DPRK meant the successful solution of the fundamental issue on which hinged the destinies of the state and people, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 He is the great statesman of general-type who has performed immortal feats to shine forever in history by leading the Party and the army, the state and the people for several decades with his extraordinary qualification and personality and distinguished political caliber as an illustrious commander born of Heaven. 
					
					 The past more than decade during which he has led the Korean revolution, shouldering upon himself the heavy responsibility as chairman of the NDC is an unforgettable period which witnessed an epoch-making change in strengthening and developing the Korean revolutionary armed forces and a glorious period during which he fully demonstrated the heroic spirit of Korea dynamically advancing toward a bright morrow, weathering manifold trials. 
					
					 The precious feats he has performed by leading the Korean revolution as chairman of the NDC are that he made the DPRK always shed its rays as Kim Il Sung's Korea, augmented the political and military potentials of the country in every way and laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people. 
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the servicepersons and people to fully demonstrate the dignity of the DPRK and spirit of sure victory under the uplifted banner of Songun, while keeping in their mind the great honor and happiness of having Kim Jong Il at the helm of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Cover up Human Rights Abuses Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Cover up Human Rights Abuses Flayed
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- It has been recently disclosed that the United States committed the hideous crime against humanity, stirring up a worldwide furor. The U.S. arrested a Briton of Ethiopian origin in 2002 and used serious torture on him before transferring to the Guantanamo prison, according to Reuters.
					  What mattered is the fact that the U.S. prosecution appeased him to admit his guilty, promising that doing so would reduce his prison term, and forced him to make testimony unfavorable to other terror suspects. In the end, it asked him not to open to the press the facts about torture on the condition of his release.
					
					 Minju Joson in a signed commentary Wednesday says:
					
					 This shows how sinisterly the U.S. worked to hide its human rights abuses.
					
					 From the legal viewpoint, it is strictly prohibited to use a serious torture on a suspect in a bid to ascertain any criminal fact.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. made human rights abuses without hesitation by maltreating prisoners in gross violation of international laws.
					
					 What is more serious is the fact that the said human rights abuses, branded as the most tragic case in the 21st century, were made under the approval and order of the U.S. ruling quarters. 
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. human rights abuses were not an accident perpetuated by individuals but an organized national crime by the U.S. authorities and that the U.S. ruling authorities were directly involved in this case.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to mind its own business before criticizing other countries over their human rights performance.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime's Fascist Suppression Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime's Fascist Suppression Blasted
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime is working hard to bind all fabrics of society to the chains of dictatorship by blocking the just advance of progressive forces of different circles for national unity, reunification, democracy and the right to existence. This fascist suppression comes under fire by a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday. 
					 The south Korean authorities disallowed the visit to Pyongyang by members of the South Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration under a groundless pretext, the commentary recalls, and goes on: This was an undemocratic and anti-reunification tyrannical action as it was designed to disturb any effort to achieve national reconciliation and unity, displeased with them, and bar the inter-Korean relations from improving. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities are suppressing principal participants in the rallies and meetings held by organizations of the youth and student movement after finding fault with them and further intensifying the crackdown upon the progressive media persons. 
					
					 It is quite natural for people of different circles in south Korea to turn out in protests, unable to repress their resentment at the regime's anti-reunification fascist suppression. 
					
					 It is the height of folly for the Lee Myung Bak group to run riot to suppress the south Korean people desirous of independence, democracy and reunification at the point of bayonet in a bid to prop up its traitorous rule at any cost. 
					
					 The Lee dictatorial regime is bound to meet its doom due to the fierce resistance of the people as it is recklessly standing in the way of national reunification, while blocking independent development of the society and violating democracy, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: KCNA on Japan's War Chariot
articles.content:
KCNA on Japan's War Chariot
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Ill-boding is the story about "defence" heard from Japan these days. 
					 At a recent commencement ceremony held at Defense University Prime Minister Aso and Defense Minister Hamada underlined the need to "adjust defense capability" and tighten the U.S.-Japan alliance, saying this or that about "security environment in surrounding areas" while pulling up the DPRK.
					
					 Earlier, the former chief of Staff of Air "Self-Defense Force" went the lengths of calling for having access to "ballistic missiles as offensive means" while openly asserting that Japan's strategy for "exclusive self-defense" was "wrong."
					
					 The spate of calls for "boosting defense capability" and the theory of "attack" openly let loose by government officials and military authorities of Japan clearly proves that the Japanese reactionaries have again unsheathed swords with which Japan had committed crimes to bring disasters to the world, completely oblivious of the bitter lesson drawn in the last century.
					
					 As known, the Constitution of Japan bans regular armed forces and it is not allowed to conduct overseas military operations.
					
					 It is, therefore, preposterous for Japan to talk about "attack".
					
					 In fact, the basic spirit of "the Pacifist Constitution" was quelled long ago although it had remained only for the form's sake since the end of the Second World War. It, therefore, would be right to say that the above-said Constitution does not exist in principle.
					
					 Japan adopted it as its policy to realize its wild ambition for overseas aggression after openly giving up the strategy for exclusive self-defense.
					
					 All the military preparations necessary for overseas aggression have already been completed in Japan at present. Japan is on a par with other military powers in view of its military muscle and possession of offensive forces. 
					
					 The "Self-Defense Forces (SDF)" were reorganized as regular armed forces capable of fighting a war for overseas aggression long ago under the pretext of "defending the Japan proper".
					
					  Bold plans have been pushed forward to equip the SDF with modern, mobile and long-range military hardware.
					
					 The Japanese government set the "expansion of use of satellites for security" as one of the basic orientations of its space plan in its bid to convert Japan into a military giant and round off the capability for a preemptive attack and thus launch reinvasion.
					
					 Shortly ago, it deployed Hyuga, carrier-style escort ship carrying helicopters aboard for the purpose of boosting the marine attack capability for overseas expansion.
					
					 This is more evidence proving Japan's departure from the "Pacifist Constitution" which restricts the use of Japan's military force to self-defense only.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are opting for overseas expansion by dispatching warships of its maritime SDF to countries and waters to meet their interests.
					
					 They had already sent ground, maritime and air SDFs to the Indian Ocean, Afghanistan and Iraq under the pretext of "supporting the war on terrorism", thus making a precedent of overseas military operation. Shortly ago, they sent two escort ships to the waters off Somalia under the pretext of "combating piracy".
					
					  Such disturbing moves of the Japanese government and the SDF bring to light Japan's criminal attempt to justify its moves to turn itself into a military giant and kick off reinvasion.
					
					 "Threat" from the DPRK and the like oft-repeated by them is nothing but a pretext to achieve their militarist ambition for overseas aggression.
					
					 Japan's war chariot eyeing other countries and regions is running only to fall into the abyss of destruction.

articles.title: Japan's Nuclear Weaponization Assailed
articles.content:
Japan's Nuclear Weaponization Assailed
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Japan, the world's only nuclear victim, is stepping up nuclear weaponization and making desperate efforts to launch overseas aggression, oblivious of the bitter lesson drawn in the past. This is as foolish an act as inviting destruction, warns Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed commentary.
					 More facts are now being disclosed to prove Japan's criminal scenario to go nuclear for overseas aggression, the commentary observes, and goes on: The Japanese reactionaries' moves to massively stockpile plutonium can never be overlooked.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that Japan stepped up the development and test of large-scale carrier rockets in recent years.
					
					 Japan's massive stockpiling of plutonium is aimed at manufacturing nuclear weapons in real earnest any time it deems necessary.
					
					 Japan's nuclear weaponization is aimed to launch military overseas expansion.
					
					 Japan placed itself under a complete war system after eliminating almost all the institutional and legal mechanisms lying in the way of overseas military operations. This increases the gravity of Japan's nuclear weaponization. What is more dangerous is that the Japanese reactionaries are openly pushing forward their nuclear weaponization while putting spurs to their moves for emerging a military giant and overseas expansion under the pretext of "support to the U.S. anti-terrorist war."
					
					 The danger of Japan's moves for nuclear weaponization is becoming a reality. The Japanese militarists seek to attain their criminal purpose of reinvasion at any cost by wielding a nuclear stick, obsessed with extremely revanchist ambition to revenge the defeat they sustained in the past and desire for overseas expansion.
					
					 These moves are mainly targeted against the DPRK. To this end, the Japanese reactionaries keep trumpeting about "threat" from the DPRK in a bid to ignite a war.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to drop its dangerous nuclear scenario for its own sake.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 5 on the successful launch of the experimental communications satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					 The message noted that the successful launch of the satellite represented a gun salute in the new century of Songun Korea, which startled the world, and that the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to him, reflecting the ardent reverence of all its officials and other Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 The successful putting of Kwangmyongsong-2 into its orbit in space is a great exploit that could be achieved only by you and a great auspicious event which demonstrated all over the world the might of Songun Korea, a political and military power, rapidly advancing towards the eminence of an economic power by scaling the goal of ultra-modern space science and technology, the message said, and continued:
					
					 We cannot forget August 31, 1998 during the "Arduous March" when the DPRK successfully launched Kwangmyongsong-1, brilliantly decorating the 50th founding anniversary of the DPRK as a great festival of victors. The successful putting of Kwangmyongsong-2 into its orbit represents a great victory of the Songun leadership of you turning the DPRK into a scientific and technological power.
					
					 The message expressed the will of the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan to more dynamically advance with redoubled courage along the road of patriotism with the exceptionally high national dignity and pride of being overseas citizens of the DPRK, the homeland of Juche, bestowed upon them by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Supported in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Supported in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, and Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, made public a joint statement on April 1 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The statement noted that by founding the immortal Juche idea President Kim Il Sung showed the bright road ahead of humankind and realized the centuries-old desire of the Korean people to live in a new society free from all sorts of exploitation and oppression.
					
					 The great events and brilliant successes recorded in the modern history of Korea from the backward colonial semi-feudal society to the present progress and prosperity are associated with the august name of the President, the statement said.
					
					 The election of Kim Jong Il as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission is the great happiness and honor to the world revolutionary people, it said, adding:
					
					 We will support the just cause of the Korean people to the last, being convinced that the heroic Korean People's Army and the Korean people under the distinguished Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il will build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, meeting all challenges of the imperialists and dynamically wage the drive to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho operada por el ejercito.
					  Esta fabrica situada a la orilla del rio Taedong es la base combinada de procesamiento de alimentos que produce mas de 350 generos de alimentos incluyendo el fideo, el pastel, el aceite, el confite, el te, 
						los productos agricolas y pescados procesados.
					
					  Despues de escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la fabrica, recorrio durante largo tiempo los procesos productivos y se entero detalladamente del estado de equipos tecnicos y de produccion.
					
					  Al ver los alimentos de diversos generos que se producen en cadena, se mostro muy satisfecho de que se asegura excelentemente aqui la cultura de produccion y vida y se normaliza en un alto nivel la produccion.
					
					  Esta fabrica es la planta rentable que produce en gran cantidad los alimentos especiales apoyandose estrictamente en las materias primas nacionales y la ejemplar que materializo brillantemente la orientacion del partido de registrar la innovacion en la industria ligera incluyendo el empaque, dijo y expreso sincero agradecimiento a todos los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de ella.
					
					  Esta fabrica excelente satisfizo en todos los aspectos la demanda de la era de la industria de informatica, senalo y continuo que este orgulloso exito es el precioso resultado del noble mundo espiritual de nuestro ejercito y pueblo que viven no para hoy sino para la manana con el calido patriotismo.
					
					  Aprecio altamente los meritos de los uniformados del ejercito popular infinitamente fieles al partido destacando que ellos cumplen magnificamente el papel de protagonista y precursor tambien en la ofensiva general de hoy para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera como creadores del espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					  El Dirigente estimulo cordialmente a los hombres ameritados, quienes durante largo tiempo desde el inicio de la construccion de la fabrica, trabajaron abnegadamente para el desarrollo de su planta, y se 
						fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					  Senalo que todas las provincias deben construir muchas fabricas de este tipo para contribuir a la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					 A continuacion, recorrio la Tienda de Productos Especiales Samilpho, administrada por dicha fabrica.
					
					 Destaco la necesidad de ofrecer excelentes servicios conforme a la demanda natural del comercio socialista e ilumino los remedios concretos para el respecto.
					
					  Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					  Dijo que el partido tiene la voluntad y decision de dar lo mejor a nuestro pueblo y prosiguio que la fabrica debe seguir prestando profunda atencion a la elevacion al maximo de la calidad de alimentos.
					
					  Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros comandantes del ejercito, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, Choe Ik Gyu y Kim Yang Gon.

articles.title: Acto por aniversario 16 de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como titular del CDN
articles.content:
Acto por aniversario 16 de eleccion de Kim Jong Il como titular del CDN
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el aniversario 16 de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 En el conclave participaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los funcionarios de las ramas de la ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los innovadores laborales y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					 El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					  La eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN de la RPDC devino un evento historico de importancia trascendental en la lucha por lograr la prosperidad de la patria socialista y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, comenzo el y prosiguio:
					
					  Gracias a este gran jubilo digno de registrarse en letras doradas en la historia nacional, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea obtuvieron la firme garantia para continuar y desarrollar exitosamente la idea del Presidente Kim Il Sung sobre la construccion de la autodefensa nacional, sus hazanas en esta labor y autoctona causa de la construccion del Estado y para impulsar con dinamismo la lucha de todo el pueblo por construir una patria prospera.
					
					 El Dirigente elevo la posicion y la autoridad del CDN y establecio el nuevo sistema de aparatos estatales tomando esta entidad por columna vertebral.
					
					 De esta forma, preparo la garantia del poder para consolidar nuestro regimen estatal y social en el principio de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares y practicar globalmente la politica de Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					  Hoy en dia, debemos registrar saltos historicos en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera y adelantar la reunificacion de la patria y el triunfo final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche al dar pasos agigantados del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario poniendo de pleno manifiesto las indoblegables fuerzas espirituales bajo la guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					  Es imperioso garantizar con firmeza en sentido militar la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista al seguir encauzando grandes fuerzas al fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					  Especialmente, el EPC, grueso de la revolucion y fuerzas nucleares de la defensa de la patria, debe establecer estrictamente el sistema de mando y el estilo militar revolucionarios, segun los cuales todo el ejercito deben actuar como un solo hombre de acuerdo con la idea, el proposito y las ordenes del Comandante Supremo enarbolando la consigna "!Defendamos a costa de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion encabezada por el gran camarada       Kim Jong Il!"
					
					Tenemos que impulsar continua y energicamente las labores para fortalecer el poderio de defensa nacional del pais movilizando a todo el Estado y todo el pueblo y echar la firme base material y tecnica de las fuerzas armadas de autodefensa al anteponer el desarrollo de la industria de defensa nacional y garantizar con preferencia todo lo necesario para elevar sin cesar el nivel de la jucheanizacion y la modernizacion de esa industria conforme a la demanda de la linea de construccion economica de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Es preciso establecer en toda la sociedad el clima de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares y lograr la identidad del ejercito y el pueblo en la ideologia y el estilo de lucha para poner de pleno manifiesto el orgulloso aspecto de la gran unidad entre los militares y los habitantes de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Es imprescindible materializar cabalmente la linea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais para perfeccionar los preparativos para hacer frente al tiempo de emergencia.
					
					Todos los sectores y todas las unidades deben asegurar la direccion unica del Dirigente sobre las labores de defensa nacional y poner en pleno juego el poderio del sistema de aparatos estatales al estilo coreano centrado en la defensa nacional al implantar la disciplina rigurosa de aceptar incondicionalmente las ordenes e indicaciones del CDN y cumplirlas sin falta y a tiempo.
					
					En pleno acato a la 3 Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria que sintetizan el noble ideal patriotico del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente           Kim Jong Il, tenemos que registrar cambios trascendentales en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria frustrando tajantemente la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y las maniobras conflictivas de las fuerzas opositoras a la reunificacion.
					
					  Habran siempre victorias y glorias al ejercito y al pueblo coreanos que avanzan a pasos firmes hacia la gran potencia prospera socialista por la senda del Juche y del Songun enalteciendo al Dirigente en el maximo puesto y uniendose monoliticamente en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta de agregados militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta de agregados militares
  Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 16o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente  Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Cuerpo de Agregados Militares acreditados en Corea le dirigio un cesto de flores y la carta de felicitacion.
					  El agregado militar de la Embajada de la Republica de Cuba, Miguel Angel Gala Valiente, quien preside el citado cuerpo, los entrego el dia 8 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Capitalinos aplauden el lanzamiento exitoso de "Kwangmyongsong No.2"
articles.content:
Capitalinos aplauden el lanzamiento exitoso de "Kwangmyongsong No.2"
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la capitalina Plaza Kim Il Sung el acto multitudinario de la ciudad de Pyongyang para aplaudir el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No. 2".
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado y mas de cien mil capitalinos de distintos sectores.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok.
					
					  El lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong No. 2" es un gran jubilo nacional, que demuestra la dignidad y el invencible poderio nacional de la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar), y un evento historico que significo la detonacion de las primeras salvas de victoria en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					  A traves del presente lanzamiento, quedaron manifestados el poderio de la industria del Juche, consolidada durante varios decenios por el pueblo coreano bajo la direccion del gran lider y del gran partido y a costa de sangre y sudor, y el nivel cientifico-tecnico del pais y se comprobo claramente que es definitiva la victoria de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  La gran importancia del lanzamiento del satelite artificial esta en que este suceso ha sido el primer toque en las puertas a la gran potencia prospera justamente cuando todo el pueblo libra la ofensiva general para abrirlas en el ano 2012 en que se cumple el centenario de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Ese exito, que alcanzamos en medio de la presion politica y militar sin precedente y otras maniobras freneticas de los enemigos, es el resultado brillante de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente          Kim Jong Il quien presto la atencion primordial a las labores para fortalecer el poderio politico y militar del pais y al desarrollo cientifico-tecnico previendo el maravilloso futuro de la patria.
					
					 Por lo tanto, ese suceso sera grabado para siempre en los anales de la patria como gran jubilo de la nacion de Kim Il Sung que marco un importante hito historico para el desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas del pais.
					
					 Todos nosotros debemos materializar con adelanto el proposito del PTC de construir una gran potencia prospera logrando victorias sucesivas en todos los sectores de la construccion socialista mediante un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.
					
					 Debido a la politica hostil sobre la RPDC de las fuerzas conservadoras intransigentes de Estados Unidos y a las maniobras de los belicistas del Sur de Corea, la situacion de nuestro pais sigue siendo tensa.
					
					 Es preciso establecer en toda la sociedad el clima social de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares, desarrollar con preferencia la industria de defensa nacional y fortalecer por todos los medios el poderio defensivo del pais en pleno acato a la direccion del Songun del PTC.
					
					  Acto seguido, hubo discursos de los representantes del circulo cientifico, la clase obrera, los trabajadores agricolas, la juventud y el estudiantado.
					
					  Los oradores felicitaron calidamente a los cientificos, tecnicos y obreros que sonaron el primer canonazo del triunfo tocando fuertemente las puertas a la gran potencia prospera al poner correctamente en la orbita el satelite "Kwangmyongsong No.2" fabricado el cien por ciento con los productos nacionales.
					
					 Este exito -prosiguieron- significo un golpe duro a las arrogantes potencias imperialistas como EE.UU.  que actuan demencialmente para realizar su ambicion dominacionista jactandose de su "superioridad cientifico-tecnologica".
					
					  Ademas, devino un plausible acontecimiento historico que demostro cuan fuertes son la dignidad nacional y la independencia del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, recalcaron.
					
					  Por ultimo, ellos expresaron sus decisiones de producir grandes innovaciones y saltos en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera bajo la direccion del PTC.
